entry.title: Next meeting is November 18, 2023
entry.summary: As announced yesterday on our Slack and our Google Group, our next meeting is today at 1:00PM ET. We're going to have a jam-packed session, discussing upcoming Cyberwildcats CTFs, a discussion of the MITRE ATT&CK Framework and how cyber adversaries operate, a sneak peak at the talk of …
entry.content:
As announced yesterday on our Slack and our Google Group, our next meeting is today at 1:00PM ET. We're going to have a jam-packed session, discussing upcoming Cyberwildcats CTFs, a discussion of the MITRE ATT&CK Framework and how cyber adversaries operate, a sneak peak at the talk of our upcoming guest speaker, plus an orientation for all of our new members!

Zoom details have been posted to both Slack and the Google Group. We look forward to seeing you there!

entry.title: Welcome to the new Cyberwildcats.net!
entry.summary: Well, it's been a little while since our old Wordpress site went down and I stood up an emergency HTML page to provide the most minimal of websites, but at long last here is our new site! This has been built using Pelican and Github Pages This new facility will …
entry.content:
Well, it's been a little while since our old Wordpress site went down and I stood up an emergency HTML page to provide the most minimal of websites, but at long last here is our new site! This has been built using Pelican and Github Pages This new facility will be developed more over the days, weeks, and months ahead, but Cyberwildcats should find a good bit more use and facility in this new website. If any Cyberwildcats have content to post or ideas of what should go up on this site, pleae give a shout out in the #website channel on our Slack!

Want to join Cyberwildcats? Just fill out the Cyberwildcats Application Form!

Find out when Cyberwildcats events are happening with the Cyberwildcats Event Calendar
